title: Colors - RAL

metadata.description: Learn about Colors - RAL with clear explanations and practical examples.

content_sections.title: Details
content_sections.content:
The RAL Color Standard RAL is used for defining standard colors for paint and coatings. It is one of the most popular European color standard used today. The colors are used in architecture, construction, industry and road safety. RAL Signal Colors Color Name (1003) w3-signal-yellow (2010) w3-signal-orange (3001) w3-signal-red (4008) w3-signal-violet (5005) w3-signal-blue (6032) w3-signal-green (7004) w3-signal-grey (8002) w3-signal-brown (9003) w3-signal-white (9004) w3-signal-black The numbers in parentheses are references to the RAL Color Standard. The hex values are non official approximate values intended to simulate signal colors in HTML. Example
STOP
WAIT
GO
RAL Traffic Colors Color Name (1023) w3-traffic-yellow (2009) w3-traffic-orange (3020) w3-traffic-red (4006) w3-traffic-purple (6024) w3-traffic-green (5017) w3-traffic-blue (7042) w3-traffic-grey (9016) w3-traffic-white (9017) w3-traffic-black The numbers in parentheses are references to the RAL Color Standard. The hex values are non official approximate values intended to simulate traffic colors in HTML. quiz.question:
What is RAL

The RAL Color Standard
RAL?
options: used for defining standard colors for paint and coatings
one of the most popular European color standard used today
quiz.explanation:
The correct definition of RAL

The RAL Color Standard
RAL is 'used for defining standard colors for paint and coatings'.

quiz.question: What is It?
options: one of the most popular European color standard used today
used for defining standard colors for paint and coatings
quiz.explanation: The correct definition of It is 'one of the most popular European color standard used today'.

summary: This tutorial covers Colors - RAL concepts and techniques. You'll learn how to use Colors - RAL effectively, including key principles, common patterns, and practical examples. By the end of this tutorial, you'll have a solid understanding of Colors - RAL and how to apply it in your projects.
